sentences.en: Anatomic lesions in KBS involve the bilateral temporal lobe.
Are you talking about the left temporal lobe?
sentences.cn: 你是在说左边那个暂时性突出物?

sentences.en: By this algorithm, Z language can also describe the temporal relations easily.
sentences.cn: 利用这一算法, Z语言也能方便地描述时序关系.

sentences.en: Concretely, the expressive power of Temporal Petri Nets is argued firstly.
sentences.cn: 具体内容上, 本文首先讨论了时序Petri网语言表达能力.

sentences.en: Fluctuations are spatial and temporal in character.
sentences.cn: 这种波动的特点是空间性和瞬时性的.

sentences.en: Follow - up brain CT revealed a hemorrhagic infarction over right temporal lobe.
sentences.cn: 其后的头部计算机断层追踪检查,于右侧颞叶发现出血性梗塞.

sentences.en: Giant cell ( temporal ) arteritis is uncommon before age 50.
sentences.cn: 巨细胞动脉炎 ( 颞动脉 ) 在50岁以前较少见.

sentences.en: Of most concern to Dr. Schneider , however, was her left temporal lobe.
sentences.cn: 施奈德医生最担心的是她的左颞叶.

sentences.en: One is also able to see how specific acts are related to a temporal and spatial context.
sentences.cn: 人们也能看出具体行为是如何与时空相关联的。

sentences.en: Place your sword upon the ground , and rest in the temporal peace.
sentences.cn: 放下你的剑吧, 静享这暂时的和平.

sentences.en: Primate models of amnesia: Contribution of specific medial temporal - lobe areas.
sentences.cn: 遗忘症的灵长类模式: 特定中颞叶区域的贡献.

sentences.en: Sometimes temporal fluctuation may take place inthe local velocity.
sentences.cn: 有时,在局部速度中可能出现瞬时脉动.

sentences.en: Spatial and temporal variations in the air movement are desirable for fresh environments.
sentences.cn: 空气运动随空间和瞬时而变化是新鲜环境的要求.

sentences.en: Temporal isolation appears to be possible.
That guilt , though it may attain temporal splendor , can never confer real happiness.
sentences.cn: 犯罪的人纵能荣耀一时, 却不能得到真正的幸福.

sentences.en: the temporal character of human existence

phrases.tran_cn: 时间分辨率；瞬时分辨力；瞬时清晰度
时间序列；时间程序，时间层序

trans.tran_cn: 时间的，世俗的，暂存的，<语>表示时间的
trans.tran_en: related to or limited by time

trans.tran_cn: 暂存的事物，世间的事物，世俗的权力，一时的事物，俗事
